Text:
I'm sure I'll enjoy this, even if she can't write a song by herself - ever. I'll mostly get it to see if it's a trainwreck or not.

Thanks for providing this!!!

While Courtney herself has been somewhat of a trainwreck at times, I don't believe she has ever put out a trainwreck of an album, and this album is no exception.  It is a great album.  I think she is the greatest and most bad ass female rocker of all time.
Also, she has written many songs by herself and is perfectly capable of doing so.
Americas Sweetheart was a train wreck - even she admitted it.

Ya, I'm thinkin slipknot has a thing for her...

Might be some good songs, but I've seen WAY too much evidence that she killed Kurt to think anything remotely good of her personally!

Three times the lethal dose of heroin in him!

http://www.justiceforkurt.com/investigation/reasons.shtml

The "note" was no suicide note, it was Kurt telling everyone he was leaving the music industry, as the 2nd note she hid clarifies. That's why she won't let the public see it!

http://www.cobaincase.com/

Sick.
